text: Györgytarló is a village in Sárospatak District of Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén County. Its population in 2024 was 477. == Location == It lies on the right bank of the Tisza, 95 kilometres east of Miskolc by road. The surrounding settlements are 8 km away from Kenézlő, 18-18 km from Bodroghalom and Tiszakarád, 19 km from Tiszacsermely, and the nearest town is Sárospatak, also 19 km away. == History == Before 1954 the settlement was part of Sárospatak. == Population == In 2022, 92.5% of the population identified as Hungarian, 14.3% as Roma, and 0.2% as German (7.3% did not declare; due to dual identities, the total may exceed 100%). In terms of religion, 26.9% were Roman Catholic, 21.8% Reformed, 8.8% Greek Catholic, 1% other Christian, and 12.6% non-denominational (28.3% did not respond). == Notes == == Other websites == * Györgytarló Municipality website Category:Settlements in Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén County Category:Villages in Hungary
title: Györgytarló
